description:
goprotobuf: Make UnmarshalText reset the message before unmarshaling.

This is the expected behaviour, and matches Unmarshal.

messages.text:
Hello r (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/goprotobuf

LGTM

if you say so. i seem to recall that the old behavior was a deliberate decision.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/goprotobuf/source/detail?r=d54cbe4bdc25 ***

goprotobuf: Make UnmarshalText reset the message before unmarshaling.

This is the expected behaviour, and matches Unmarshal.

R=r
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/12449043
